original_title: Disturbed Live in Concert (Inside The Fire)
overview: Formed in 1994 as Brawl, the band was renamed Disturbed in 1996 after Draiman was hired as the band's new vocalist. The band has released six studio albums, five of which have consecutively debuted at No. 1 on The Billboard 200. This DVD contains the full concert, recorded in 2008.
title: Disturbed Live in Concert (Inside The Fire)
